The girls were making steps out of rocks. They weren't supposed to step on the lines. P almost fell over and had her hands on the ground. 32: Give me your hand and I'll pull you up. 124: No. You can't do that. 32: Oh. Never mind. 124: No. You're not supposed to. 32: Alright I won't do it. 124 walked behind P and said: Put one foot on top of the other and then you can standup without stepping on the line. P: No. I can do it now. She gradually moved her hands up to her feet and was going to stand up. 33 came up and kicked her feet. P: You kick me"Ã®you want to die. She stood up and continued to play until she missed. Then P walked up to 33 and hit her and said: Why did you kick me? 33 have her a dirty look, but didn't say anything. 42 took her turn. P watched the others take their turns. (MC)

P, 122 & 58 were playing cards for rubber bands. P was dealer. 69 walked up with an orange and held it out to P. P: What do you want? Do you want die to open it for you? No. No. 69 looked at P angrily and raised his fist. P laughed and flinched back dramatically and said: Please don't hit me. Please don't hit me. P went back to dealing the cards. 69 stood and pounded on P with the orange. P ignored him. P lost from 58 and won from 122. P paid off 58 with three rubber bands and said: Oh. Three, three. P put the cards out and said: Anyone want to cut the cards? 58 cut them. P: Now this time, you have to let me win once. Nobody said anything and looked at their cards. 122 & 58 asked for more cards so P dealt them. 114 was nearby squeezing water out of a broken ball with a corncob in it. He was hitting all the kids with it and they were squealing. P and the others shopped playing to watch. P: He is using a ball to do that. Hey! 58! That is your ball. 59 (very loud): That's my ball! 114 walked up and said: That's your ball? P: Yes, that is his ball. It has a hole in it. 58: Yes, it's mine.114: Naaaa! Every ball with a hold in it is yours. Do you know where we got this? We found it at the river. P to 58: Must be that somebody in your family threw it away. 122: I found it near your house and I didn't want it so I threw it down to the river. P & 58 didn't say anything more and went back to the card game. 114: Huh! Your ball! 114 walked away. P broke even on the next game. They played again. (MC)
